thread.title: Black Friday 2025 Travel Deals: Australia Flights, Hotels & Tours
thread.title_full: Black Friday 2025 Travel Deals: Australia Flights, Hotels & Tours

author: Melissa Woodley
title: Black Friday 2025 Travel Deals: Australia Flights, Hotels & Tours
text:
[[image]]([cta_link])
[category]
[title]
We've found the best flight, hotel and tour sales – book early and save big
Looking for an excuse to book that next getaway? Black Friday has your back. While the big day isn’t officially until Friday, November 28, most brands are kicking off the sales early – and you should too! Did someone say early Christmas present?
We’ve rounded up all the craziest airline, hotel and tour sales happening right now. Take a peek – you’d be silly not to cash in on these epic discounts. Need inspiration on where to go? Here are the best places to travel in Australia in 2025.
Black Friday is basically a massive sale day, with retailers offering huge discounts on everything from fashion and electronics to home goods and, our favourite, travel. It happens the day after Thanksgiving in the US, but it has become huge worldwide, including in Australia.
In 2025, Black Friday falls on Friday, November 28. It’s the same day as in the US, but Aussies often see the sales kick off a few weeks prior and extend through the weekend into Cyber Monday (December 1).
Score up to 20 per cent off on selected AAT Kings classic and small group tours across Australia and New Zealand here.
Available from: November 4 to December 1
Score up to 15 per cent off last-minute escapes when you stay by January 7, 2026 here.
Available from: Now
Score up to 20 per cent off trips on more than 160 worldwide trips for 18s to 35s here.
Available from: November 4 to December 4
Score up to 40 per cent off select hotels booked via the app for stays between November 20, 2025 and December 30, 2026 here.
Available from: November 20 to December 2
TBC – stay tuned here.
Available from: November 19
Score up to 30 per cent off more than 400 global small-group tours departing before April 2026 here.
Available from: Now to November 30
Score up to $500 off per couple on global tours of seven to ten days, or up to $600 off per couple for tours of 11 to 14 days here. Valid for trips between January 1, 2026 and December 31, 2026.
Available from: Now to December 1
Score up to 20 per cent off on a range of more than 900 adventures in 90 countries across Short Breaks, Active, Family and 18 to 35s travel styles. Valid on select trips from December 1, 2025 and December 14, 2026 here.
Available from: November 13 to December 4
Save up to $6,000 on hundreds of global tours departing in 2026 and 2027 here.
Available from: November 7 to December 2
Score 30 per cent off when you book two nights at any Minor Hotels property, including Oaks Hotels, Suites and Resorts and Avani Hotels. Valid for stays between November 18, 2025 and June 3, 2026 here.
Available from: November 18 to December 3
Score 30 per cent off stays at participating Pan Pacific Hotels and Resorts, and PARKROYAL Hotels and Resorts across Australia. Valid for stays between November 20, 2025 and September 30, 2026 here.
Available from: November 20 to December 3
Score 25 per cent off summer escapes at Salter Brothers’ luxury regional getaways in NSW, SA and QLD, including Spicers and Bannisters. Valid for stays between December 1, 2025 and March 31, 2026 here.
Available from: November 6, 2025 to Jan 5, 2026
Score up to 50 per cent off accommodation at Ayers Rock Resort for stays of three nights or more, with complimentary cultural activities, plus kids stay free. Valid for trips between December 1, 2025 and March 17, 2026 here.
Available from: November 10 to December 3
Score domestic flights from $70 one way to Sydney, Melbourne, the Gold Coast, Adelaide, Brisbane, Cairns and Perth via Mix & Match here.
Available from: Now until sold out
Score 80 per cent off a second sailor on all voyages through 2027, plus get up to $400 in free drinks. Valid for trips between October 31, 2025 and November 4, 2027 here.
Available from: Now until November 20
